abstract: Venice Commission of the Council of Europe rebukes Poland's right-wing government over push to impede  ability of country's constitutional court to rule on new laws; leaders of Law and Justice Party dismiss ruling, which seems likely to deepen gulf between Brussels and party months before Poland hosts leaders from North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
lead_paragraph: A European watchdog group on Friday said Poland’s right-wing government had blunted the functions of the country’s constitutional court.

headline.main: Poland’s Government Is Accused of Violating Separation of Powers
headline.print_headline: European Rights Panel Rebukes Poland Over Legal Changes

snippet: A European watchdog group on Friday said Poland’s right-wing government had blunted the functions of the country’s constitutional court.
